activatable_foodraw_berry_grape_staminar: Oh, so sweet. Make excellent raisins. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest and Eerie Pines biomes in the Wildlands.

activatable_foodraw_berry_raspberry_maxs: Nature's fine dessert, even when on its own and unaided. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Evergreen Forest biomes.

activatable_foodraw_berry_rosehip_hprege: Treasure of the heath. \nCan be gathered in Drowned Lands in the Wildlands.
activatable_foodraw_berry_strawberry_sta: Sun kissed strawberries, nature's love, brings joy and invigorates the heart with sweet tenderness. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Evergreen Forest biomes.

activatable_foodraw_deadly_nightshade_fr: Attractive, psychoactive, dangerous. Will it be your friend? \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest in the Wildlands.
activatable_foodraw_green_apple_maxhp_23: Fruit of the gods. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_amanitarega: A mushroom with a well deserved, dubious reputation. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_bay_bolete_: With a lightly bitter and earthy taste, a firm and spongy texture, the raw Bay Bolete lacks the nutty notes it gains when cooked. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest in the Wildlands.

a shiver runs through you. You remember the Feast of Zeb, the grotesque excess of the gluttonous demon and his maggots devouring the land. Yet, this humble mushroom endured, untouched. You recall Demira’s quiet smile as she recognized its resilience—one of the few gifts of Creation that Zeb could not defile.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_berserker_h: Red, white, ominous. \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Forsaken Forest biomes.

you hear echoes of laughter, of rituals in the lost halls of Atlantis. Were you there? You doubt it... The priests believed consuming this mushroom would reveal glimpses of the Divine’s mind. But you know better—those who glimpsed too much never returned the same.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_chanterelle: Everyone's favorite mushroom. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_chlorine_st: Foul smelling and a rather rare mushroom of unknown qualities.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_dapperling_: For some forgotten reason, this mushroom has a rather sullied reputation. Often found around conifers. \nCan be gathered in Eerie Pines.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_deathcap_st: Looks delicious, sounds deadly. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_divine_maxh: If it is the legendary mushroom from Axis Mundi or not, this mushroom makes everything a tiny bit better.  \nCan be gathered in Old Forest and Evergreen Forest biomes.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_enoki_hpreg: Usually counted by the dozen. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_fools_webca: A deadly trap for hungry fools. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest in the Wildlands.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_morel_maxhp: With a shape reminiscent of a honeycomb, this mushroom is most delicious. \nCan be gathered in Whispering Woods.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_oyster_maxh: With a taste and consistency reminiscent of its marine namesake. \nCan be gathered in Evergreen Forest in the Wildlands.

activatable_foodraw_mushroom_porcini_max: The taste of harvest festival favorites and winter stews.

activatable_foodraw_mushroom_stinkhorn_m: Tastes slightly better than its smell would indicate. \nCan be gathered in Whispering Woods in the Wildlands.
activatable_foodraw_mushroom_trumpet_max: Mild and delicious. \nCan be gathered in Forsaken Forest and Eerie Pines biomes.
activatable_foodraw_plum_hpregen_5_Local: Bite sized joy of nature. \nCan be gathered in Eerie Pines and Cursed Rocklands biomes.

you recall the Fay orchards, where these plums grew in perfect harmony with the land. Demira once carried a handful in her palm, offering them to those who would listen. "Patience," she had said, "is the shield against despair." You feel the lingering touch of that lesson, as if the fruit remembers her words.

color_dye_leathertanning_black_02_Locali: There's black and then there's black. This is… black.
color_dye_leathertanning_blue_01_Localiz: Be not the color within, beautiful though it is
color_dye_leathertanning_brown_01_Locali: Leather is often brown, but there are many shades.
color_dye_leathertanning_light_01_Locali: A light shade of brown which highlights the textures of the leather.
color_dye_leathertanning_orange_01_Local: Where the sun cannot be harnessed, its color may be
color_dye_leathertanning_red_01_Localiza: One cannot hide in such a color, though a hide may be such a color
color_dye_leathertanning_red_02_Localiza: A classic choice for a classic material.
color_dye_oakapple_LocalizationDescripti: Reminiscent of an oak apple, this dye turns objects a mellow red
color_dye_oakbark_LocalizationDescriptio: When grey and brown met, they formed this color
color_dye_redonionskins_LocalizationDesc: A red dye verging on purple, and without the scent of onions.
color_dye_silver_LocalizationDescription: Impart the image of wealth unto cloth.
color_dye_steel_LocalizationDescriptionK: Strong and solid in nature, this color implies the same
color_dye_tyrian_LocalizationDescription: Royal in its splendor, this dye is derived from certain sea shells.
color_dye_verdigris_LocalizationDescript: A green pigment similar to aged copper.
color_dye_woad_LocalizationDescriptionKe: The flower may be yellow, but this is indigo.
color_dye_yellowonionskins_LocalizationD: Almost translucent in its color, this dye provides a delicate yellow
consumable_berry_blueberry_examine_descr: Contains the sweetness of the earth and brings ones spirit to the present moment
consumable_mushroom_berserker_examine_de: This mushroom looks too good to be edible, or is it?
consumable_mushroom_pennybun_examine_des: A star in the mushroom world
consumable_potion_healthpotion_examine_d: Peering into the glass, this drink seems to be somehow, alive.
crafter_alchemy_reagent_distillery_1_Loc: For the most elementary of refining processes.
crafter_alchemy_reagent_distillery_2_Loc: <italic>One becomes two, two becomes three, and by means of the third and fourth achieves unity; thus two are but one.</>
crafter_alchemy_workbench_1_Localization: <italic>Your memory and your senses are but the nourishment of your creative impulse.</>
crafter_alchemy_workbench_2_Localization: <italic>The highest degree of medicine is Love.</>
crafter_alchemy_workbench_3_Localization: <italic>You are an alchemist; make gold of that.</>
crafter_alcohol_distillery_1_Localizatio: <italic>Bubbles brew and pop with the heat. Metal ticks and clicks as it cools.</>
crafter_alcohol_distillery_2_Localizatio: <italic>Stand still and listen. A solution exists within. It need only be concocted.</>
crafter_alcohol_distillery_3_Localizatio: <italic>The moon shines on those with dedication even those gone blind.</>
crafter_animal_feeding_bowl_1_Localizati: <italic>Slop and slurry sully this sorry sight. Still someone is sated.</>
crafter_animal_feeding_rack_1_Localizati: <italic>Raised to seek something higher, what is found may still be on the ground.</>
crafter_anvil_basic_iron_1_LocalizationD: <italic>Hasten slowly, and without losing heart, put your work twenty times upon the anvil.</>
crafter_anvil_heavy_iron_1_LocalizationD: <italic>The Divine shapes stone, but human hands grow the metal with every beat of hammer and heart.</>
crafter_anvil_stone_1_LocalizationDescri: <italic>The anvil is not afraid of the hammer.</>
crafter_beehive_1_LocalizationDescriptio: <italic>The lovely flowers embarrass me; they make me regret I am not a bee.</>
crafter_beehive_2_LocalizationDescriptio: <italic>For so work the honey bees, creatures that by a rule in nature, teach the act of order to a peopled kingdom.</>
crafter_blacksmith_armor_workbench_1_Loc: <italic>Armor, the kind of clothing worn by those whose tailor is a blacksmith.</>
crafter_blacksmith_armor_workbench_2_Loc: <italic>The armorers, accomplishing the knights, with busy hammers closing rivets up, give dreadful note of preparation.</>
crafter_blacksmith_armor_workbench_3_Loc: <italic>In war, events of importance are the result of trivial causes.</>
crafter_blacksmith_tool_workbench_1_Loca: <italic>The best investment is in the tools of one ́s own trade.</>
crafter_blacksmith_tool_workbench_2_Loca: <italic>Better tools expand the world from within.</>
crafter_blacksmith_tool_workbench_3_Loca: <italic>Effort offers plenty, better tools give you the time to enjoy it.</>
crafter_blacksmith_weapon_workbench_1_Lo: <italic>The arms are fair when the intent of bearing them is just.</>
crafter_blacksmith_weapon_workbench_2_Lo: <italic>I have no words, my voice is my sword.</>
crafter_blacksmith_weapon_workbench_3_Lo: <italic>And all the Gods go with you! upon your sword Sit laurel victory! and smooth success Be strew ́d before your feet!</>
crafter_blacksmith_workbench_1_Localizat: <italic>Soot and slag is scattered about as the metal is persuaded.</>
crafter_blacksmith_workbench_2_Localizat: <italic>I saw a smith stand with his hammer, thus, the whilst his iron did on the anvil cool.</>
crafter_blacksmith_workbench_3_Localizat: <italic>The smith a mighty man is he, With large and sinewy hands. And the muscles of his brawny arms, Are strong as iron bands.</>
crafter_bottling_station_1_LocalizationD: <italic>It is not the liquor that kills the man, but the thirst.</> \nA repurposed cask rigged with funnels, taps, and wooden pegs, ideal for bottling brews, bitters, and wine. As humble as it is handy.
crafter_bread_oven_1_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>If thou tastest the crust of bread, thou tastest all the stars and all the heavens.</>
crafter_bread_oven_2_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>Bread is the king of the table and all else is merely the court that surrounds.</>
crafter_brick_dryer_1_LocalizationDescri: <italic>No man ever wetted clay and then left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.</>
crafter_builder_workbench_1_Localization: <italic>In a world where carpenters get resurrected, anything is possible.</>\nA sturdy bench used to craft chests and decorative furniture.
crafter_builder_workbench_3_Localization: <italic>Plans shape reality while reality shapes plans.</>
crafter_charcoal_kiln_1_LocalizationDesc: <italic>Putting wood at the mercy of an invisible power.</>
crafter_charcoal_kiln_2_LocalizationDesc: <italic>Putting wood at the mercy of an invisible power.</>
crafter_charcuterie_workbench_1_Localiza: <italic>Laughter is brightest in the place where the food is.</>
crafter_charcuterie_workbench_2_Localiza: <italic>Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.</>
crafter_charcuterie_workbench_3_Localiza: <italic>The nourishment of body is food, while the nourishment of the soul is feeding others.</>
crafter_chopping_block_1_LocalizationDes: <italic>Before enlightenment: chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water.</>
crafter_chopping_block_1_LocalizationMys: a whisper stirs in your mind: <italic>This was the first altar, after the loss of Paradise.</>
crafter_cooking_camp_fire_1_Localization: <italic>The stars are my roof, the wilderness is my bedroom and the campfire is my warmth.</>
you hear the echo of a lullaby once taught by Meirothea, sung in a language now lost.
crafter_cooking_hearth_1_LocalizationDes: <italic>There is no peace more delightful than one's own fireplace.</>
crafter_cooking_hearth_2_LocalizationDes: <italic>Love is a single meal shared with friends.</>
crafter_cooking_hearth_3_LocalizationDes: <italic>Tis an ill cook that cannot lick his own fingers.</>
crafter_cooking_workbench_1_Localization: <italic>On an empty stomach, everyone becomes a cook.</>
crafter_decorator_station_1_Localization: <italic>Adding color to your life and belongings.</>
crafter_enchanting_station_armor_1_Local: <italic>Prayers and wishes spoken do not make dreams come true, or do they?</>
crafter_enchanting_station_cloth_1_Local: <italic>Every stitch carries a prayer. Every prayer a dream of Creation.</>
crafter_enchanting_station_leather_1_Loc: <italic>That which is bound in matter can yet be freed through will and wisdom.</>
crafter_enchanting_station_wieldables_1_: <italic>Pierce the Veil. Linger in the realm. Return to The Creation. Wield or weld at will.</>
crafter_farming_plot_earthen_1_Localizat: <italic>Fallow at rest. Sow to seed. Reap to render. Burn to cleanse.</>
crafter_farming_plot_stonewalled_1_Local: <italic>Dry stone sets a boundary and binds humanity to The Creation for a time.</>
crafter_fermenter_2_LocalizationDescript: <italic>Fermentation is the exhalation of a substance through the admixture of a ferment which, by virtue of its spirit, penetrates the mass and transforms it into its own nature.</>
crafter_fermenter_3_LocalizationDescript: <italic>Fermentation is the art of alchemy by Nature itself.</>
crafter_fish_smokery_1_LocalizationDescr: <italic>Its smoke, for some, is a stench; to others, it is an aroma. The results are usually in between.</>
crafter_fishing_workbench_1_Localization: <italic>The lure of a fly for a fickle fish lies in the layer of lies laid with allure.</>
crafter_fletching_workbench_1_Localizati: <italic>Draw archers, draw your arrows to the head!</>
crafter_fletching_workbench_2_Localizati: <italic>Arrows, like words, must be sharp to reach their mark.</>
crafter_fletching_workbench_3_Localizati: <italic>Fetch back old work, leave it not as mark of passing, lest one need a thrashing.</>
crafter_forge_1_LocalizationDescriptionK: <italic>Bonds are broken and bound anew with every element added.</>
crafter_forge_2_LocalizationDescriptionK: <italic>Of the four elements, air, earth, water, and fire, man stole only one from the gods. Fire. And with it, man forged his will upon the world.</>
crafter_forge_3_LocalizationDescriptionK: <italic>Of the four elements, air, earth, water, and fire, man stole only one from the gods. Fire. And with it, man forged his will upon the world.</>
crafter_founders_station_1_LocalizationD: <italic>I will not be tamed: My spirit is wild and untamable</>
crafter_generic_workbench_1_Localization: <italic>He who works with his hands and his head and his heart is an artist.</> \nThe cherished companion for every settler, providing all the essential tools and materials to begin your journey.
crafter_heraldry_station_1_LocalizationD: <italic>A symbol is a sign, a meaning, a purpose. Around it humanity may rally.</>
crafter_herb_planter_1_LocalizationDescr: <italic>Poisons abound, remedies are at the ready. A taste of both can tickle the tongue.</>
crafter_jewelcrafting_workbench_2_Locali: <italic>Bangles, brooches, and bracelets bring brightness and beauty.</>
crafter_jewelcrafting_workbench_3_Locali: <italic>Set the stones and etch the runes. With these rings wrought humanity signals the dogged.</>
crafter_leather_curing_rack_1_Localizati: <italic>Stretched and scraped, animals bear the scars of humanity's nakedness.</>
crafter_leather_curing_rack_2_Localizati: <italic>Where would I find enough leather to cover the entire surface of the earth? But with leather soles beneath my feet, It's as if the whole world has been covered.</>
crafter_leatherworking_workbench_2_Local: <italic>Organization is the mark of a craftsperson on a journey towards mastery.</>
crafter_leatherworking_workbench_3_Local: <italic>An altar to the ingenuity of a concerted effort, the leatherworking table is unlike any other.</>
crafter_mill_grain_2_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>With the sounds of the stone wheel and wood axle turning and churning.</>
crafter_mill_wood_saw_1_LocalizationDesc: <italic>Sawdust and bark scatter from the saw. Fingers may be lost.</>
crafter_ropemaker_station_1_Localization: <italic>Hemp and twine wound together and rolled round still more.</>
crafter_smelter_basic_1_LocalizationDesc: <italic>Size matters not when it's the temper that determines the result.</>
crafter_smelter_furnace_2_LocalizationDe: <italic>One of Armozel's grand gifts to man.</>
crafter_spinning_wheel_1_LocalizationDes: <italic>The briar carries many thorns to catch the unwary. The spindle hides its own.</>
crafter_spit_roast_1_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>Turned slowly to evenly cook the delectable fare to perfection, infusing it with smoky flavor and ensuring a tender, juicy outcome.</>
crafter_spit_roast_2_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>Turned slowly to evenly cook the delectable fare to perfection, infusing it with smoky flavor and ensuring a tender, juicy outcome.</>
crafter_tailoring_workbench_1_Localizati: <italic>Sewing is like magic, but with fabric.</>
crafter_tailoring_workbench_2_Localizati: <italic>Patterns show themselves to those who will it. Patience and a keen eye are requisite.</>
crafter_tailoring_workbench_3_Localizati: <italic>The soul of this man is his clothes.</>
crafter_water_well_1_LocalizationDescrip: <italic>Before enlightenment: chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment; chop wood, carry water.</>
crafter_weaving_loom_1_LocalizationDescr: <italic>Fibers run to-and-fro as patterns are revealed.</>
crafter_weaving_loom_1_LocalizationMyste: a whisper stirs, the voice of Saint Nectarine perhaps? <italic>In every woven thread, a fragment of grace.</>
crafter_weaving_loom_3_LocalizationDescr: <italic>Cocoons split asunder revealing nothing of use. It's the shell that defines.</>
crafter_wine_barrel_1_LocalizationDescri: <italic>Cast in casks a bevy of beverages ages alike.</>
intent_drop_LocalizationDescriptionKey: Drop an item to the ground
item_bow_stave_LocalizationDescriptionKe: A fair, but rather heavy bow stave, offering tension through strength.
item_bow_stave_coarse_LocalizationDescri: Considering how short you have been practicing fletching, this attempt at a bow stave is not bad at all.
item_bow_stave_fine_LocalizationDescript: Great craftsmanship and quality raw materials combined.
item_bow_stave_rough_LocalizationDescrip: Considering how long you have been practicing fletching, this attempt at a bow stave is not bad at all.
item_bow_stave_supeior_LocalizationDescr: This will make an outstanding bow!

item_enchanting_consumable_tier_4_Locali: Used for Enchanting gear. Grants 125 Item Power when applied on an item.

item_material_animal_glue_fine_bone_Loca: Refined glue strengthened with antler collagen. Ideal for precise or high-quality work.
item_material_animal_lard_LocalizationDe: Rendered animal fat, a delicious and versatile cooking ingredient.

item_material_animal_tallow_Localization: Rendered suet. A pure fat product that is valuable for all sorts of crafting processes.

item_material_axe_handle_fine_Localizati: A balanced and reinforced handle, carved for optimized swing.

item_material_bronze_sheet_LocalizationD: Sheet of metal, processed and ready to be shaped to the crafters needs.
item_material_bronze_spike_LocalizationD: For when a nail is not enough.
item_material_button_gold_LocalizationDe: Decorative fasteners crafted from or plated with gold.
item_material_button_horn_LocalizationDe: Buttons shaped from polished horn, durable and natural.
item_material_button_silver_Localization: Metal buttons with shine and resilience.
item_material_button_wood_LocalizationDe: Simple, carved fasteners made from treated wood.
item_material_charcoal_examine_descripti: The earthly element found in all living things
item_material_charcoal_heartwood_Localiz: Charcoal made of heartwood. Burns hot, used in smelting.
item_material_clay_bricks_examine_descri: Clay tamed by fire, an enduring creation.
item_material_clay_shingles_Localization: A roofing tile made of baked clay.
item_material_cotton_cloth_LocalizationD: The manufacturing of cotton is said to have originated in Anatolia.
item_material_cotton_string_Localization: Smooth and strong cord made of cotton.
item_material_cotton_string_coarse_Local: Coarse cord made from cotton fibers.
item_material_cotton_wadding_Localizatio: A soft inner fill used for warmth or insulation beneath armor.
item_material_crafting_iron_anvil_head_L: Used to make some Forge Parts.
item_material_crafting_pins_Localization: Holds pieces of fabric together when making clothes.
item_material_crafting_sewing_needles_Lo: Used for sewing and stitching when making clothes.
item_material_crafting_sewing_needles_ex: Straight and slender, not only a practical tool for manufacture, but also for embrodery and ornaments.
item_material_crafting_steel_anvil_head_: Necessary to make the Craftsman Forge Parts.
item_material_dough_barley_LocalizationD: Hearty and rustic, it carries a nutty essence and promises a comforting taste of tradition with every bite.
item_material_dough_oat_LocalizationDesc: Coarse yet comforting, it cradles hints of nuttiness and earthiness, promising wholesome satisfaction with each bite.
item_material_dough_rye_LocalizationDesc: Hearty and dense, it whispers of earthiness and warmth, promising a rustic indulgence.
item_material_dough_wheat_LocalizationDe: A golden canvas, supple and elastic, ready to yield to the hands of the artisan, promising warmth, nourishment, and the aroma of home.
item_material_enchanting_extract_crude_L: Fresh sap roughly drawn from Ambergrasp, thick and cloudy. The work of a novice alchemist.

the sap shivers, and you feel the pull of something ancient, wounds that are not yours, grief that burns like sap drawn from bark.\nA voice calls, warm and breaking, yet powerful. Another snarls from beneath. Low guttural, older than the world itself.
item_material_enchanting_extract_exquisi: Crystalized Ambergrasp sap, smooth and warm to the touch.

the resin pulses in your hand and the vision overwhelms you.
You feel Demira’s strength flowing through your limbs as you plunge an amber spear into a colossal, gaping maw.
Burning blood sears your flesh, a scream like tearing stone shatters your breath.From the darkness, curses echo. Beelzebub’s guttural promise to devour Creation when freed.
Your essence splinters, your spirit fractures, merging with the spear as it roots into glowing amber veins that still bleed beneath Lyonesse, forever binding his hunger between worlds.
item_material_enchanting_extract_fine_Lo: A denser, purified form of Ambergrasp sap that glows faintly.

you start to see shapes in the liquid. You see a giant woman... Demira...\nThe Third Redeemer stands, her hand aflame, driving a spear of amber through the throat of a monstruous head.\nThe blood scream and hurls. Molten hunger dropping from the wound.
item_material_enchanting_powder_crude_Lo: Jagged Canonite fragments roughly cut from shattered Papal constructs. Their scorched faces bear broken lines of scripture, most too worn to read.

you catch glimpses of old prayers, half a benediction, part of a psalm, words carved by hurried hands as the great constructs rose over Lyonesse. A faint shadow lingers here, a memory of zeal and untempered ambition.
item_material_enchanting_powder_exquisit: A perfectly rounded Canonite relic, polished to a soft sheen. Only a few pristine runes remain, glowing faintly with lingering holy power.”

the pearl feels warm in your hand. One surviving rune reads <italic>lux vincit tenebras</>, light conquers darkness. Another is too scarred to know if it was blessing or blasphemy. \nThe stone remembers faith torn in two: one path to safeguard Creation, another to release what lies beneath.
item_material_enchanting_powder_fine_Loc: Canonite stones ground and shaped smooth. Circular bands of scripture wrap their surface, faintly glowing where blessings remain intact.

the stone hums softly. Letters long faded now shine in short bursts, like candlelight in a dark nave. Fragments speak of salvation and sacrifice, though it’s unclear whether they were meant to bind corruption... or set it free.
item_material_extract_amanitaregalis_Loc: Elixir sought for its mystical properties in the alchemist's quest for enlightenment.
item_material_extract_berserker_Localiza: Extract of primal fury, by commoners thought to unlock untamed strength in the hearts of warriors.
item_material_extract_deathcap_Localizat: Bewitched essence, harbinger of peril and power in the alchemical arts.
item_material_extract_fools_webcap_Local: Concoction of trickery, believed to veil secrets and ensnare the senses.
item_material_extract_loios_tears_Locali: Precious drops of compassion and love.
item_material_extract_plant_bushy_starwo: Celestial elixir, imbued with the magic of the cosmos in the alchemist's pursuit of divine knowledge.
item_material_extract_plant_castor_plant: Extract of transformation, said to unlock the gates to other realms in the hands of the skilled alchemist.
item_material_extract_plant_crown_beard_: Essence of sovereignty, revered for its ability to bestow regal wisdom upon the enlightened.
item_material_extract_plant_daisy_Locali: Blossom of innocence, prized for its purity and mythic properties.
item_material_extract_plant_dandelion_Lo: Elixir of resilience, known for its ability to fortify the body and spirit in the alchemist's pursuit of vitality.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_alfal: Essence of abundance, believed to attract prosperity and fertility in the alchemical arts.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_batfl: Shadowed Extract, said to harness the mysteries of the night in the alchemist's quest for arcane knowledge.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_calif: Nectar of joy, revered for its ability to soothe the troubled mind and lift the spirit.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_campi: Extract of protection, whispered to shield the soul from harm in the hands of the alchemist.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_crane: Elixir of grace, believed to bestow elegance and beauty upon those who partake.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_datur: Forbidden fruit, said to unlock visions of the beyond in the alchemist's pursuit of enlightenment.
Leaf of delirium, known to blur the boundaries between worlds in the hands of the adept alchemist.
Gateway essence, whispered to open the doors to realms unknown to mortal eyes.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_deadl: Extract of shadows, believed to hold the secrets of the underworld in ancient alchemy.
Leaf of darkness, said to veil the mind in the mysteries of the night.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_highm: Elixir of tranquility, known to calm the restless soul and soothe troubled spirits.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_laven: Essence of serenity, cherished for its ability to bring peace and harmony to the alchemist's laboratory.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_loios: An extract from a legendary plant, with tiny, gleaming pieces of residue suspended and playing with the light.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_pasqu: Blossom of rebirth, whispered to awaken dormant potential in the alchemist's hands.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_plant: Extract of healing, known for its ability to mend wounds and soothe ailments in the alchemist's art.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_redpo: Essence of dreams, believed to unlock the gates to the realm of visions.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_soapw: Cleansing elixir, revered for its ability to purify body and soul in the hands of the alchemist.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_tansy: Herb of protection, believed to ward off malevolent forces and bring fortune to the alchemist's endeavors.
item_material_extract_plant_flower_wolfs: Extract of transformation, said to harness the primal energies of the wolf in the hands of the adept alchemist.
Seed of power, whispered to unlock the secrets of the hunt in alchemical lore.
item_material_extract_plant_herb_angelic: Essence of celestial guidance, believed to bring clarity and insight to the alchemist's mind.
item_material_extract_plant_herb_lily_Lo: Elixir of purity, revered for its ability to cleanse and protect.
item_material_extract_plant_herb_meadows: Blossom of enchantment, believed to attract love and joy to the alchemist's life.
item_material_extract_plant_periwinkle_L: Extract of memory, whispered to unlock forgotten knowledge in the alchemist's quest for wisdom.
item_material_extract_plant_rain_lily_Lo: Essence of renewal, known to bring new beginnings and fresh starts to the alchemist's journey.
item_material_extract_plant_sowthistle_L: Herb of fortune, believed to bring luck and prosperity to the alchemist's endeavors.
item_material_extract_skullcap_Localizat: Poisonous extract? Should be used with care.
item_material_extract_stinkhorn_Localiza: Elixir of allure, whispered to ensnare the senses and captivate the heart.
item_material_flour_barley_LocalizationD: A foundation for countless baked delights, barley flour lends rustic quality to a loaf.
item_material_flour_oat_LocalizationDesc: Nutritious and versatile, providing a subtly sweet flavor and hearty texture to baked goods and recipes.
item_material_flour_rye_LocalizationDesc: Robust, earthy alternative to wheat flour, lending a distinct flavor and texture to baked goods.
item_material_flour_wheat_LocalizationDe: Versatile, staple ingredient for baking, cooking, and thickening, derived from ground wheat grains.
item_material_hardened_corded_padding_li: Reinforced padding made from densely corded linen.

item_relic_armorshred_01_a_LocalizationD: While clearly of an extra natural origin, this magically charged earthly matter carries no sense of evil, nor does it seem to have been touched by the Divine. It feels different somehow. And as if that was not enough, how did it end up attached to this unnatural beast in the first place?
item_relic_armorshred_01_b_LocalizationD: A dark, rough to the touch and extremely heavy slab of stone. Unnaturally heavy. It seems to be etched with the mark of the demon its former owner was a servitor to, a dark relic indeed. Apart from being a constant reminder to its bearer of his Master's will, who knows what other meaning or connection it carries over to someone who possesses it?
item_relic_armorshred_01_c_LocalizationD: A small locket, containing a tiny cutout from the original Papal bull that informed the Inquisition, a relic of the order: "At the commencement of his term of office, at the assembly of citizens convoked as is the custom, by the authority of the city or feudal domain, the head of state or ruler of the city or feudal domain shall accuse of criminal conduct all heretics of both sexes, no matter by what name they appear on the rolls of citizens."
item_relic_armorshred_02_a_LocalizationD: Slightly pulsating stone, said to be a conduit through which words and ideas may flow past the Veil in any direction. Holding this in the palm of one's hand gives the feeling of being drained and pulled, but where to, one can only guess.

item_resource_feudal_LocalizationMystery: a faint warmth pulsing through the pale fibers. Heartbeat or memory, you cannot tell.

resource_feudal_large_LocalizationDescri: A towering white giant whose bowed branches trail like shrouds. Beneath its roots lie the fallen of Lyonesse. Their sighs drift upward, feeding its ghostly bloom. When it stirs, the earth remembers war.
resource_feudal_large_LocalizationMyster: A tremor runs through the trunk. For an instant, you see arms in the wood, reaching, not for mercy, but for rest.
resource_feudal_medium_LocalizationDescr: Broad and sorrowful, its silver-white canopy hangs low like a mourning veil. The trunk twists with shapes almost human, and the ground beneath it seems darker, as if it drinks shadow instead of rain.
resource_feudal_medium_LocalizationMyste: Pale bark, damp as skin. The air is heavy here. Full of memory, full of wanting release.
resource_feudal_small_LocalizationDescri: A slender, ghost-pale tree with drooping leaves that rustle though no wind stirs. Its bark gleams faintly, smooth as bone, and the roots clutch the soil as if unwilling to let go.
resource_feudal_small_LocalizationMyster: The tree leans toward you, its leaves whispering like faraway voices. For a heartbeat, you think one calls your name.
resource_static_enchanting_demira_resin_: A dark, thorny plant with coiled branches gripping a glowing humming amber sap.
two voices flicker behind your eyes. One trembles like wind in leaves, soft, sorrowful. The other scrapes like teeth over stone. You do not understand the words, but they are not your own.
resource_static_enchanting_shard_Localiz: Broken chunks of stone scorched and marked by faint inscriptions. Many believe them cursed, for even the Inquisition avoids their touch.

a shadow clings to the stone, whispering of past grandeur. The script speaks of the glorious era of the Papacy: zeal, triumph, divine ambition. Yet beneath it, something darker stirs, tainting the blessing carved upon its face.
resource_static_generic_clay_Localizatio: Soft clay, used to make bricks.
resource_static_plant_berry_alpine_junip: A fragrant shrub, bearer of berries both medicinal and flavorful.
resource_static_plant_berry_blackberries: You've heard whispers of its mystical protection and abundance blessings.
resource_static_plant_berry_blueberries_: Blueberry, a fruit of the spirit.
Contains the sweetness of the earth and brings ones spirit to the present moment
resource_static_plant_berry_cloudberry_L: Delicious berries typically found in wetlands in the North.
resource_static_plant_berry_elderberries: According to ancient lore, the elderberry is a guardian of health and ward against illness.
resource_static_plant_berry_gooseberry_L: Believed to bring luck and prosperity.
resource_static_plant_berry_grapevines_L: Symbol of abundance and vitality, bearer of wine, cherished in ancient rituals.
resource_static_plant_berry_grapevines_r: A balanced grape variant, sweetness mixed with a hint of sour.
resource_static_plant_berry_grapevines_w: Oh, so sweet. Make excellent raisins.
resource_static_plant_berry_hawthorne_Lo: Guardian of the heart and spirit, warding off evil spirits in legend.
resource_static_plant_berry_pineberry_Lo: Unusual looking berries. Wonder what these are used for?
resource_static_plant_berry_raspberries_: A fruit of enchantment, whispered to grant passion and protection.
resource_static_plant_berry_red_currant_: A symbol of fortune and divination, revered for its mystical energy.
resource_static_plant_berry_rosehips_Loc: Symbol of love and beauty, believed to bring harmony and protection.
resource_static_plant_berry_strawberry_L: Strawberries, a forever favorite of everyone in Gallia.
resource_static_plant_bushy_starworth_Lo: A mystical herb, thought to guide lost souls and bring clarity to the mind.
resource_static_plant_cabbage_red_Locali: Food fit for kings. And pigs.
resource_static_plant_castor_plant_Local: A bearer of both healing and harm, known for its potent and mysterious properties.
resource_static_plant_flower_alfalfa_Loc: Alfalfa, the bountiful herb of the fields, feeds our animals with its green abundance, providing nourishment for all.
resource_static_plant_flower_alpinerose_: Mountain roses, resilient blooms of the mountain slopes.
resource_static_plant_flower_arumlilie_L: The arum lily, with its graceful white spathes and lush green leaves, exudes elegance in natural landscapes.
resource_static_plant_flower_batflower_L: A mysterious bloom believed to attract nocturnal spirits and evoke dark magic.
resource_static_plant_flower_beardediris: Endemic to Gothia, the Bearded Iris is known for its colorful, velvety petals adorned with distinctive "beards", captivate with their regal charm and striking blooms.
resource_static_plant_flower_californian: Poppies, with their vibrant petals and distinctive seed pods, paint fields with bursts of color, symbolizing both beauty and remembrance.
resource_static_plant_flower_campion_Loc: Campion, with its delicate pink or white blossoms atop slender stems, adds a touch of charm to meadows and woodland edges.
resource_static_plant_flower_crane_Local: Crane flowers, also known as bird of paradise, flaunt their vibrant, exotic blooms resembling a bird in flight, believed in some cultures to bring good fortune and symbolize freedom and beauty.
resource_static_plant_flower_daisy_exami: It is said that when a baby dies, God sprinkles daisies over the earth, others say the daisies appear to welcome new babies. The science of this is unclear.
resource_static_plant_flower_dandelion_L: Dandelions, with their sunny yellow flowers and fluffy seed heads, dot fields and lawns, embodying resilience and simplicity in nature.
resource_static_plant_flower_datura_Loca: Beware the datura's enticing beauty, for its touch can lead to madness and death.
resource_static_plant_flower_datura_exam: A vespertine flowering plant. It is said that the things people love have many names and you have heard this plant called moonflower, devil's weed, hell's bell's, devil's trumpet and thornapple.  Someone must love this plant.
resource_static_plant_flower_deadly_nigh: Shrouded in mystery, its berries hold both poison and power in ancient beliefs.
resource_static_plant_flower_edelweis_Lo: Star-shaped blooms, though to symbolize rugged beauty and resilience.
resource_static_plant_flower_foxglove_Lo: Foxglove, boasting tall spikes of tubular flowers in hues of pink, purple, or white, adds a touch of enchantment to woodlands, but beware, for its leaves and flowers contain toxic compounds.
resource_static_plant_flower_henbane_Loc: A bitter, yellow-flowered herb said to whisper to the dead. Used cautiously by seers and poisoners alike.
resource_static_plant_flower_highmallow_: High mallow, with its showy pink or purple flowers and deeply lobed leaves, graces meadows and roadsides with its vibrant presence, valued for its medicinal properties.
resource_static_plant_flower_lavender_Lo: Lavender, celebrated for its fragrant purple blossoms and calming properties, has been esteemed since ancient times for its versatile uses in medicine, perfume, and culinary applications.
resource_static_plant_flower_loios_tears: A rare herb whispered to possess mystical properties in folklore.

the dewdrops clinging to its leaves gleam like polished silver. Some believe these are the last remnants of Loios' divine tears, shed before his untimely death, forever staining the plant with his sorrow.
resource_static_plant_flower_marshmerigo: Marsh marigold, with its cheerful yellow flowers and glossy green leaves, brightens wetland habitats with its vibrant presence, heralding the arrival of spring.
resource_static_plant_flower_pasque_Loca: Pasque flowers, with their delicate purple blooms emerging early in spring, symbolize renewal and resilience as they brave the lingering chill of the season.
resource_static_plant_flower_periwinkle_: The weed to weed out other weeds.
An evergreen that irreversibly intertwines, the Periwinkle is a symbol of both immortality and love.
Periwinkle never faileth in any bodie, either man or woman.  Gerard of Baffon
resource_static_plant_flower_plantago_Lo: Plantago, with its slender spikes of tiny flowers and broad basal leaves, thrives in diverse habitats, valued for its medicinal properties and role in traditional herbal remedies.
resource_static_plant_flower_rain_lily_L: Lily that typically blooms following heavy rains.
resource_static_plant_flower_rain_lily_e: Protennoias emblem, believed to represent purity, innocence and rebirth
resource_static_plant_flower_redpoppy_Lo: The red poppy, with its vibrant scarlet petals, symbolizes remembrance and hope, blooming vividly amidst fields and meadows.
resource_static_plant_flower_soapwort_Lo: Soapwort has been used since ancient times for its natural cleansing properties.
resource_static_plant_flower_tansy_Local: Tansy, adorned with bright yellow flowers and fern-like leaves, known for its pest-repelling properties.
resource_static_plant_flower_water_hemlo: Deadly beauty, feared for its toxic potency.
resource_static_plant_flower_water_lilie: A symbol of purity and enlightenment, revered in spiritual rituals.
resource_static_plant_flower_wolfsbane_L: Legendary protector against werewolves, a potent herb with mystical properties.
resource_static_plant_fruit_apple_red_Lo: Apple, nature's sweet remedy for hunger's grip.
resource_static_plant_fruit_plum_Localiz: The Plum, symbolizing the value of patience and widely believed to ward against evil.

you recall the Fay orchards, where these plums grew in perfect harmony with the land. Demira once carried a handful in her palm, offering them to those who would listen. "Patience," she had said, "is the shield against despair." You feel the lingering touch of that lesson, as if the fruit remembers her words.
resource_static_plant_grass_barley_Local: Ancient grain revered for its nourishing properties and role in sacred rituals.
resource_static_plant_grass_cotton_Local: A soft fiber, used to make finer and more comfortable textiles.
resource_static_plant_grass_flax_Localiz: Strong fibrous plant, used to make linen.
resource_static_plant_grass_flax_examine: As is written in the good book: The one who wears linen is in a condition suitable to approach God.
resource_static_plant_grass_hemp_Localiz: Versatile plant, revered for, among other things, its strong fibers.
resource_static_plant_grass_millet_Local: Humble grain, sustainer of ancient civilizations, revered for its resilience and nourishment..
resource_static_plant_grass_oat_Localiza: Sacred grain of strength and sustenance, bestowed with health and prosperity in ancient lore.
resource_static_plant_grass_reeds_examin: It may not last a lifetime, but reeds have been used as building material since time immortal
resource_static_plant_grass_rye_Localiza: Resilient grain, bearer of sustenance and protection in ancient agricultural rites.
resource_static_plant_grass_sugarcane_Lo: Sweet gift of the earth, symbolizing abundance and prosperity in ancient cultures.
resource_static_plant_grass_wheat_Locali: Life-giving grain, symbolizing sustenance and prosperity in ancient civilizations.
the golden strands of wheat whisper of harvests past and yet to come, each grain a testament to patience, toil, and the endless gift of Demira’s grace.
resource_static_plant_herb_aeonium_Local: Aeonium, with its striking rosettes of succulent leaves, showcases mesmerizing geometric patterns in arid landscapes.
resource_static_plant_herb_alchemilla_Lo: Alchemilla is esteemed for its healing virtues and whispered to hold secrets of alchemy's mysteries.
resource_static_plant_herb_angelica_Loca: Ah, Angelica, with its tall stalks and fragrant clusters, is hailed as a divine herb, believed to ward off evil spirits and cure maladies in the wise folk remedies of yore.
resource_static_plant_herb_beebalm_Local: Verily, bee balm, with its fragrant leaves and blossoms, is a prized herb known for its healing virtues and sweet essence, cherished by both apothecaries and beekeepers.
resource_static_plant_herb_chives_Locali: Chives, with slender leaves and delicate blooms, grace medieval tables with their savory flavor.
resource_static_plant_herb_cobralily_Loc: Ah, the cobra lily, a fearsome plant with hooded blooms, thought by some to harbor secrets of magic.
resource_static_plant_herb_crown_beard_L: A regal herb, revered for its mystical properties in ancient healing rituals.
resource_static_plant_herb_fennel_Locali: Fennel, with its feathery leaves and aromatic seeds, is treasured as a culinary herb and esteemed for its medicinal properties, gracing the tables and apothecaries.
resource_static_plant_herb_garlic_Locali: A bulb of great culinary significance.
resource_static_plant_herb_hellebore_Loc: Hellebore, with its dark leaves and captivating blooms, holds potent properties in ancient herblore.
resource_static_plant_herb_lemongrass_Lo: Lemon grass, with its fragrant leaves and citrusy scent, flavors dishes and brews.
resource_static_plant_herb_lily_Localiza: Lily of the valley, with its delicate white bells and sweet fragrance, graces forests with its enchanting beauty and symbolizes purity and renewal.
resource_static_plant_herb_mandrake_Loca: Mandrake, with its twisted roots and potent legend, holds both mythical allure and dread in ancient lore.
resource_static_plant_herb_meadowsweet_L: Meadowsweet, with its clusters of creamy-white flowers and sweet aroma, graces fields and streamsides.
resource_static_plant_herb_mistletoe_Loc: Mistletoe, with its green leaves and white berries, holds mystical significance in ancient traditions, believed to bring luck and ward off evil spirits.
resource_static_plant_herb_mustard_Local: Pungent seed, symbolizing strength and vitality in ancient culinary and medicinal practices.
resource_static_plant_herb_parsley_Local: Parsley, with its vibrant green leaves and fresh flavor, is a staple herb in culinary dishes and herbal remedies, valued for its versatility and health benefits throughout the ages.
resource_static_plant_herb_rosemary_Loca: Rosemary, with fragrant leaves and blue flowers, is cherished in ancient lore and cooking.
resource_static_plant_herb_ruta_Localiza: Rue, with its blue-green foliage and bitter taste, has been esteemed since ancient times for its medicinal properties and protective qualities against evil spirits.
resource_static_plant_herb_sage_Localiza: Sacred herb, bearer of wisdom and protection in ancient rituals and lore.
resource_static_plant_herb_snapdragon_Lo: Snapdragon, with its colorful, snap-like flowers, captivates with its whimsical appearance and holds symbolic meaning in ancient tales of both protection and trickery.
resource_static_plant_herb_sowthistle_Lo: Humble weed, believed to bring luck and prosperity in ancient folklore.
resource_static_plant_herb_thyme_Localiz: Thyme, prized for its culinary and medicinal properties, esteemed for its versatility and enduring charm.
resource_static_plant_herb_watercress_Lo: Watercress, with peppery leaves and aquatic habitat, is prized for its flavor and nutrients.
resource_static_plant_hops_LocalizationD: The guardian of ale, preserving its flavor and bestowing it with a touch of herbal magic.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_amanitare: Amanita regalis, with its striking appearance and potent toxicity, is both revered and feared.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_bay_bolet: Often considered as a poor relation of the Penny Bun, the Bay Bolete was extremely popular during the Age of the Kingdoms due to its resilience to the maggots of Gluttony.

a shiver runs through you. You remember the Feast of Zeb, the grotesque excess of the gluttonous demon and his maggots devouring the land. Yet, this humble mushroom endured, untouched. You recall Demira's quiet smile as she recognized its resilience—one of the few gifts of Creation that Zeb could not defile.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_berserker: This mushroom looks too good to be edible.

you hear echoes of laughter, of rituals in the lost halls of Atlantis. Were you there? You doubt it... The priests believed consuming this mushroom would reveal glimpses of the Divine's mind. But you know better—those who glimpsed too much never returned the same.
Insects seem to avoid this mushroom. Maybe they are trying to tell us something?
resource_static_plant_mushroom_chanterel: Golden treasure of the forest, revered for its mystical allure and delicate flavor.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_chlorine_: The chlorine mushroom, with its distinctive green hue and toxic properties, is shrouded in cautionary tales and feared for its harmful effects on those who dare to ingest it.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_dapperlin: Mysterious mushroom, whispered to hold secrets of fortune and fate.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_death_cap: This may be your last meal
resource_static_plant_mushroom_devilsfin: Devil's Finger, with their eerie appearance, evoke both fascination and dread.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_divine_Lo: Enigmatic fungus, said to sometimes unlock visions and communication with spirits.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_enoki_Loc: Enoki mushrooms, slender and mild, are prized for their delicate texture.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_firecoral: The Poison Fire Coral, with its fiery red appearance and toxic nature, instills fear and caution in those who encounter it, a symbol of danger in the wilderness.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_fools_web: Mischievous mushroom, hiding poison beneath its enticing guise.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_morels_Lo: Elusive delicacy, revered for its earthy flavor and believed to bring luck in ancient foraging lore.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_oyster_mu: Symbol of abundance and resilience, cherished in ancient cultures for its nourishment.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_pennybun_: Coveted mushroom, believed to bring fortune and prosperity to those who find it.

the spirals on its surface seem familiar, mirroring the ancient glyphs on the Stelae. You recognize the pattern instinctively—it is the mark of Demira, the symbol she pressed into the land itself. Once, this mushroom grew near her temples, a silent offering of sustenance for those who walked in her footsteps.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_porcini_L: King of mushrooms, revered for its rich flavor and esteemed status in culinary traditions.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_skullcap_: A small, brownish-orange fungus with a bell-shaped cap. It is well known for its deadly toxicity... However, you oddly feel you should consume it.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_stinkhorn: The Elegant Stinkhorn, with its graceful yet pungent appearance, intrigues and repels in equal measure, a peculiar marvel of the forest floor.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_trumpets_: Dark herald of the forest, prized for its rich flavor and mystical allure in ancient tales.
resource_static_plant_mushroom_veiledlad: The Veiled Lady, with her ethereal beauty and mysterious allure, enchants all who gaze upon her delicate form.
resource_static_plant_onion_red_Localiza: Humble bulbs from the earth, grant depth to our dishes with their pungent sweetness.
resource_static_plant_onion_yellow_Local: Humble bulbs from the earth, grant depth to our dishes with their pungent sweetness.
resource_static_plant_sand_LocalizationD: A bunch of tiny grains of rock.
resource_static_plant_tree_branch_Locali: the twisting form of the branch tells of seasons endured, each bend a record of storms weathered and the unyielding reach toward the sky.
resource_static_plant_tree_branch_examin: Has a size and shape that suffices for simple use
resource_static_rock_copper_deposit_Loca: The color indicates that this rock may contain a fair amount of copper.
resource_static_rock_copper_deposit_exam: The color indicates that this rock may contain a fair amount of copper
resource_static_rock_cox_LocalizationDes: Coke, for the hight heat burn.
resource_static_rock_flint_deposit_Local: Brittle and hard type of stone that produces sharp edges when broken.
resource_static_rock_flint_deposit_exami: Waxy, almost glassy type of stone that has been used for tool making since the beginning of time
resource_static_rock_flint_stones_Locali: Brittle and hard type of stone that produces sharp edges when it breaks.
resource_static_rock_flint_stones_examin: Waxy, almost glassy type of stone that has been used for tool making since the beginning of time
resource_static_rock_gneiss_deposit_Loca: Cold and strangely soft to the touch, until you realize it is your flesh that is yielding.
resource_static_rock_gneiss_deposit_exam: Delicate layers upon layers of crystallized rock, dark upon white upon red upon white again, you can easily see how the almighty grew this rock into mountains at the beginning of time.
resource_static_rock_gneiss_stones_Local: Cold and strangely soft to the touch, until you realize it is your flesh that is yielding.
the ancient layers of the gneiss reveal their story, pressed and folded by time itself, a silent reminder that all foundations are shaped by the weight of ages.
resource_static_rock_gneiss_stones_exami: Delicate layers upon layers of crystallized rock, dark upon white upon red upon white again, you can easily see how the almighty grew this rock into mountains at the beginning of time.
resource_static_rock_granite_deposit_Loc: Earth's enduring stone, symbolizing strength and permanence in ancient monuments and legends.

resource_static_rock_limestone_deposit_L: Bedrock of ancient construction, revered for its role in shaping civilizations.

skill_armor_leather_feet_LocalizationDes: Proficiency with rugged boots that quiet the step while bracing the stride across wilderness and war.

skill_armor_leather_head_LocalizationDes: Skill in wearing fitted leather or reinforced hoods that protect the head without sacrificing perception.
skill_armor_leather_legs_LocalizationDes: Mastery of toughened legwear designed for movement and resilience under pressure.
skill_armor_metal_arms_LocalizationDescr: The art of bracing arms in metal, bearing both shield and weapon with steady resistance.
skill_armor_metal_chest_LocalizationDesc: Training with cuirasses and breastplates of tempered metal, crafted to guard the heart of the warrior.
skill_armor_metal_feet_LocalizationDescr: Proficiency in wearing metal boots and sabatons, grounding each step in strength and protection.
skill_armor_metal_hands_LocalizationDesc: Control and discipline in metal gauntlets, enabling both crushing force and precision.
skill_armor_metal_head_LocalizationDescr: Skill in wearing metal helms, forged to shield the mind and skull from blade and spell.
skill_armor_metal_legs_LocalizationDescr: Proficiency in wearing metal boots and sabatons, grounding each step in strength and protection.
skill_armor_smithing_LocalizationDescrip: The art of creating armor and shields.
skill_baking_LocalizationDescriptionKey: The art of preparing and cooking food, using dry heat, preferably in an oven.
skill_blacksmithing_LocalizationDescript: <italic>By hammer and hand all arts doth stand</>
skill_block_LocalizationDescriptionKey: The often life saving skill of effectively maneuvering a shield between yourself and an incoming blow.
skill_bows_LocalizationDescriptionKey: The skill that measures how effectively an archer can steer their arrow to their target.
skill_building_LocalizationDescriptionKe: Creating useful things from wood and bone.
skill_charcuterie_LocalizationDescriptio: The fine, albeit grisly art of parting an animal and preparing it for cooking.
skill_cloth_enchanting_LocalizationDescr: Empower Clothing with the blessing of the Divine
skill_cooking_LocalizationDescriptionKey: Considering the fact that one has to eat two or three times every day, learning how to cook will undoubtedly help to make life more enjoyable.
skill_fletching_LocalizationDescriptionK: The craft of making and maintaining bows and arrows, named for the feathers of an arrow.
skill_herbalism_LocalizationDescriptionK: The practical knowledge and use of plants and plant materials.

skill_jewelerycrafting_LocalizationDescr: The art of turning fine metals and gems into objects of personal adornment.
skill_leather_enchanting_LocalizationDes: Empower Leather Items with the blessing of the Divine
skill_leatherworking_LocalizationDescrip: The entire process of transforming raw animal hides into clothing and armor.
skill_mining_LocalizationDescriptionKey: The skill that governs the process of removing useful metals and minerals from the earth's strata.
skill_offhand_craftiness_LocalizationDes: When the left hand knows what the right hand is doing.
skill_offhand_shields_LocalizationDescri: The practiced use of shield-bearing to block and hold the line where blades would otherwise pass.
skill_tailoring_LocalizationDescriptionK: The craft that most flamboyantly separates humans from other creatures.
skill_tools_enchanting_LocalizationDescr: Empower Tools with the blessing of the Divine

skill_weapon_smithing_LocalizationDescri: The art of creating weapons and tools.
skill_winery_and_brewing_LocalizationDes: The fine art of improving a beverage by means of fermentation.
skill_woodcutting_LocalizationDescriptio: The laborious skill of cutting down trees most effectively and with least effort.
spell_alacrity_LocalizationDescriptionKe: Increases your spell casting speed by <bold>{SpellCastingTimeModifier}%</> and decreases Spirit cost by <bold>{EnergyCostModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_ambush_LocalizationDescriptionKey: You meld into the environment. Become invisible to your enemies for<bold>{Duration}</>or until you attack or cast another spell. Gain Ambush damage charges over time which will greatly <bold>empower your next attack.</>
spell_area_root_channeling_LocalizationD: While channeling, the caster becomes immobile, entering a trance-like state. Enemies within a <bold>{AoeRadius}</> radius are <bold>chained</> to the ground
spell_atk_360_2hsword_01_LocalizationDes: Opportunity attack, swiping at all nearby enemies.
spell_atk_cone_1hsword_01_LocalizationDe: Opportunity attack, swipe at your enemies.
spell_atk_cone_shred_2haxe_01_Localizati: A vicious twirling attack sending the axe blade's razor cutting through anything within reach.
spell_atk_double_shred_1haxe_01_Localiza: Opportunity attack, shredding your opponents' armor.
spell_atk_ground_aoe_2hclub_01_Localizat: Opportunity attack, shocking all nearby enemies.
spell_atk_line_aoe_2hspear_01_Localizati: Opportunity attack, running through multiple enemies.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hmace_01_Locali: Swing your weapon with authority. Deal <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and become <bold>threatening</>. \nThreat generation is increased by <bold>{AggroModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hmace_02_Locali: Perform a heavy strike, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and <bold>stunning</> enemies for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hmace_03_Locali: Smash down violently, fracturing the ground beneath you. The impact deals <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and <bold>weakens</> enemies, reducing their damage by <bold>{PhysicalDamageModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hspear_01_Local: Quickly drive your spear forward in a focused thrust, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hspear_02_Local: Overwhelm your target with relentless pressure. Deliver a rapid series of thrusts, each striking for <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hspear_03_Local: Leap forward to deliver a crippling strike, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> and reducing target movement speed by <bold>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hsword_01_Local: Deal <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage. Each strike fills you with <bold>divine rapture</>, increasing attack speed by <bold>{StackAttackSpeedModifier}%</> and movement speed by <bold>{StackMovementSpeedModifier}%</> for 10s. Effect stacks up to <bold>{NumStack}</> times.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hsword_02_Local: Perform a kick that deals <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and <bold>interrupts</> enemy spell casting. If a spell is interrupted, the target also becomes <bold>silenced</> for <bold>{SilenceDuration}</>.
spell_atk_melee_special_1hsword_03_Local: Deals damage based on the amount of <bold>divine rapture</> stacks on you. <bold>{DamageAtStack0}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack1}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack2}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack3}</> damage. Consumes all stacks when used.
spell_atk_melee_special_2haxe_01_Localiz: Deliver a powerful overhead chop, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and each strike adds a <bold>armor shred</> on the target. Reduces the target’s physical defense by <bold>{SlashingPhysicalResistance}</> for <bold>{Duration}</>. Stacks up to <bold>{NumStacks}</> times.
spell_atk_melee_special_2haxe_02_Localiz: Swing in a broad arc, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</>. All enemies struck gain <bold>armor shred</> charges equal to the highest stack count among targets hit.
spell_atk_melee_special_2haxe_03_Localiz: A vicious twirling, forward moving attack - sending the axe blade's razor cutting through anything within reach. Deals <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage on both swings.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hmace_01_Locali: Deliver a powerful sideways smash, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and generating <bold>{Aggro}</> threat.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hmace_02_Locali: Prepare for a powerful strike and slam your mace down, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage and <bold>{Aggro}</> threat.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hmace_03_Locali: Become the eye of a storm. Command violent winds to spiral around you, pulling nearby enemies into your reach. Enemies are <bold>chained</> for <bold>{Duration}</> upon landing.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hspear_01_Local: Thrust the spear forward to deal <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hspear_02_Local: Drive the spear down to incapacitate your target, causing them to be <bold>chained</> for <bold>{Duration}</>. Deals <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hspear_03_Local: Perform a full reach thrust for <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage} damage</>. Pull the polearm back to launch the enemy behind your position. Enemy is <bold>chained</> for <bold>{ChainedDuration}</> on landing.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hsword_01_Local: Deal <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage. Each strike fills you with <bold>divine rapture</>, increasing attack speed by <bold>{StackAttackSpeedModifier}%</> and movement speed by <bold>{StackMovementSpeedModifier}%</> for 10s. Effect stacks up to <bold>{NumStack}</> times.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hsword_02_Local: Perform a heavy rising slash that breaks through blocks, dealing <bold>{TotalWieldableDamage}</> damage. Successfully breaking a block briefly stuns the enemy.
spell_atk_melee_special_2hsword_03_Local: Deals damage based on the amount of <bold>divine rapture</> stacks on you. <bold>{DamageAtStack0}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack1}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack2}</>/<bold>{DamageAtStack3}</> damage. Consumes all stacks when used.
spell_atk_stagger_1hclub_01_Localization: Opportunity attack, attempt to stagger your enemies.
spell_atk_swing_greatsword_01_Localizati: Opportunity attack, attempting to disembowel your enemies.
spell_atk_taunt_dot_1hsword_01_Localizat: Strikes a single opponent with force that generates threat and deals damage.
spell_atk_taunt_dot_1hsword_02_Localizat: Strikes a single opponent with full force that generates a lot of threat and deals heavy damage.
spell_atk_taunt_dot_1hsword_03_Localizat: Strikes a single opponent with devastating force that generates a lot of threat and deals heavy damage.
spell_atk_taunt_stun_shield_01_Localizat: Slams your opponent with your shield, dealing damage, generating threat and stunning them briefly.
spell_atk_taunt_stun_shield_02_Localizat: Slams your opponent with your shield, dealing damage, generating threat and stunning them briefly.
spell_atk_taunt_stun_shield_03_Localizat: Forcefully slams your opponent with your shield, dealing damage, generating threat and stunning them briefly.
spell_attack_projectile_01_LocalizationD: Fires a projectile dealing <damage>{TotalDamage} damage</> to enemies.
spell_buff_attack_speed_01_LocalizationD: Increases melee attack speed by <bold>{MeleeAttackSpeedModifier}% </> and melee attack damage by <bold>{PhysicalDamageModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_buff_displace_immunity_self_Locali: Makes you <bold>immune to displacement effects</> and increases your crowd control resistance by <bold>{CrowdControlResistanceModifier}</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_buff_maxhealth_aoe_caster_01_Local: Increases the maximum health of all nearby allies and yourself for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_aoe_caster_02_Local: Increases the maximum health of all nearby allies and yourself for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_aoe_caster_03_Local: Greatly increases the maximum health of all nearby allies and yourself for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_target_01_Localizat: Increases the maximum health of yourself and up to one chosen ally for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_target_02_Localizat: Increases the maximum health of yourself and up to one chosen ally for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_target_03_Localizat: Considerably increases the maximum health of yourself and up to one chosen ally for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_maxhealth_target_04_Localizat: Greatly increases the maximum health of yourself and up to one chosen ally for 60 minutes.
spell_buff_self_runspeed_02_Localization: Increases movement speed by <bold>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</> for <bold>{Duration}</>. Sprinting does not consume stamina during the effect.
spell_buff_self_runspeed_energy_Localiza: Increases your movement speed by <bold>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</> and regenerates <bold>{Energy} Spirit/s</> for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_buff_sprint_stack_LocalizationDesc: Increase movement speed by <bold>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</> every second. Stacks up to <bold>{NumStacks}</> times. Effect lasts for {Duration}.
spell_cleanse_self_LocalizationDescripti: Remove all harmful effects from yourself.
spell_cleanse_target_LocalizationDescrip: Remove a harmful effect from a friend.
spell_cooldownreduction_LocalizationDesc: Advances all currently active cooldowns by <bold>{CooldownDurationChange}</> seconds.
spell_defensive_stance_LocalizationDescr: Increases all physical defenses by <bold>{SlashingPhysicalResistance}</> for <bold>{Duration}</>. Protects the next <bold>{NumStacks}</> instances of damage. Reduces mobility for the duration. Can be turned off by activating again.
spell_divine_protection_01_LocalizationD: For the next <bold>{Duration}</>, become invulnerable to up to <bold>{NumStacks}</> melee attacks, each <heal>restoring health</> equal to its full amount.
spell_fire_dd_homing_projectile_01_Local: Casts an elemental homing projectile that deals fire damage and can briefly set the target on fire.
spell_fire_dd_homing_projectile_02_Local: Casts an elemental homing projectile that deals fire damage and can briefly set the target on fire.
spell_fire_dd_homing_projectile_03_Local: Casts an elemental homing projectile that deals large amounts of fire damage and can set the target on fire.
spell_fire_dd_homing_projectile_04_Local: Casts an elemental homing projectile that deals large amounts of fire damage and can set the target on fire.
spell_fury_LocalizationDescriptionKey: Generates <bold>{Aggro}</> aggro towards all enemies in a cone in front of you. Gain stamina over time based on how many enemies were affected.
spell_heal_bomb_01_LocalizationDescripti: Place a <bold>{GroundInitialRadius}</> area which will burst after <bold>{GroundDelayDuration}</> giving allies in the area <heal>{Health} health.</>
spell_heal_channel_aoe_01_LocalizationDe: Channel healing energy within <bold>{AoeRadius}</> around you, giving <heal>{Health} health</> up to <bold>{TotalChannelTickCount} times</>.
spell_heal_hot_aoe_enemycount_01_Localiz: Place a <bold>{GroundRadius}</> area lasting <bold>{GroundDuration}</> which applies a scaling heal over time based on the number of enemies (up to {MaxEnemyCount}) inside the area for <heal>{HealthStack0} | {HealthStack1} | {HealthStack2} | {HealthStack3} | {HealthStack4} | {HealthStack5}</>
spell_heal_hot_stack_01_LocalizationDesc: Give a stack of <bold>regrowth</> to an ally, providing <heal>{HealthStack1} | {HealthStack2} | {HealthStack3} health per second</>for <bold>{Duration}</>. After 3 stacks have been applied, the next stack will overflow giving<heal>{HealthStackOverflow} health</> and removing all stacks.
spell_heal_hot_stack_maxxer_01_Localizat: Heal allies within <bold>{AoeRadius}</> based on the number of <bold>regrowth</> stacks on them for <heal>{HealthStack0} | {HealthStack1} | {HealthStack2} | {HealthStack3}</>, and refresh the duration of all <bold>regrowth</> effects.
spell_heal_low_health_01_LocalizationDes: Heal a target for <heal>{BonusHealth}</> if their health is below <bold>{LowHealthThreshold}%</>.\n Otherwise, heal them for <heal>{ReducedHealth}</>.
spell_heal_projectile_01_LocalizationDes: Fires a projectile which will splash<heal>{Health} health</>to allies within <bold>{ExplosionRadius}.</>
spell_heal_self_channeling_01_Localizati: Regain <heal>{Health} health</> over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.
spell_heal_self_energy_channeling_Locali: Regain <heal>{Health} health</> and <bold>{Energy} Spirit</> over the duration of the prayer. Can only be used while out of combat.
spell_heal_target_01_LocalizationDescrip: Channels Divine support in order to heal yourself and up to one chosen ally.
spell_heal_target_02_LocalizationDescrip: Channels Divine support in order to heal yourself and up to one chosen ally.
spell_heal_target_03_LocalizationDescrip: Channels Divine support in order to heal yourself and up to one chosen ally.
spell_heal_target_04_LocalizationDescrip: Channels Divine support to considerably heal yourself and up to one chosen ally.
spell_heal_target_05_LocalizationDescrip: Channels Divine support to greatly heal yourself and up to one chosen ally.
spell_heal_target_direct_01_Localization: Heal a single ally, or yourself, for <heal>{Health} health.</>
spell_hot_aoe_caster_01_LocalizationDesc: Heals all allies within range by <heal>{Health} health</> and grant them a blessing that increases healing received for <bold>{Duration}</>.
spell_hot_aoe_ground_01_LocalizationDesc: Consecrates an area surrounding the caster - increases defenses of all allies inside its limits by <bold>{SlashingPhysicalResistance}</>.
spell_hot_aoe_ground_02_LocalizationDesc: Consecrates an area surrounding the caster, healing all allies standing inside its limits and increasing their chances of resisting ill effects.
spell_hot_aoe_ground_03_LocalizationDesc: Consecrates an area surrounding the caster, healing all allies standing inside its limits and increasing their chances of resisting ill effects.
spell_hot_aoe_ground_04_LocalizationDesc: Consecrates an area surrounding the caster, healing all allies standing inside its limits and increasing their chances of resisting ill effects.
spell_hot_target_01_LocalizationDescript: Offers the blessing of renewal to yourself and up to one chosen ally, regenerating your health over time.
spell_hot_target_02_LocalizationDescript: Offers the blessing of renewal to yourself and up to one chosen ally, regenerating your health over time.
spell_hot_target_03_LocalizationDescript: Offers the blessing of renewal to yourself and up to one chosen ally, regenerating your health over time.
spell_life_gain_on_melee_LocalizationDes: Restore <heal>{Health} health</> whenever you deal non-periodic melee damage to a target within {Duration}. Effect can be activated up to 12 times.
spell_lull_target_01_LocalizationDescrip: Places an unknowing target into a lulled state, reducing their awareness by <bold>{SightReductionPercent}%</>. Has no effect on enemies who are already aware of your presence. Effect lasts for <bold>{Duration}</>
spell_lull_target_02_LocalizationDescrip: Places an unknowing target into a lulled state, reducing their awareness by {SightReductionPercent}%. Has no effect on enemies who are already aware of your presence.
spell_lull_target_03_LocalizationDescrip: Places an unknowing target into a lulled state, reducing their awareness by {SightReductionPercent}%. Has no effect on enemies who are already aware of your presence.
spell_mez_aoe_caster_01_LocalizationDesc: Mesmerizes up to <bold>3</> enemies within range, rendering them entranced for <bold>{Duration}</> or until they take damage.
spell_mez_aoe_caster_02_LocalizationDesc: Mesmerizes all enemies within range, rendering them entranced until the effect wears off or they take damage.
spell_mez_aoe_caster_03_LocalizationDesc: Mesmerizes all enemies within range, rendering them entranced until the effect wears off or they take damage.
spell_mez_target_01_LocalizationDescript: Mesmerizes enemy within range, rendering them entranced for <bold>{Duration}</> or until they take damage.
spell_mez_target_02_LocalizationDescript: Mesmerizes target enemy within range, rendering them paralyzed until the effect wears off or they take damage.
spell_mez_target_03_LocalizationDescript: Mesmerizes target enemy within range, rendering them paralyzed until the effect wears off or they take damage.
